properties.areaDesc: Western Columbia River Gorge; Western Columbia River Gorge
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 8:11PM PST until January 16 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Storm total snow accumulations
of 3 to 6 inches will fall near Cascade Locks and Stevenson. A
tenth to three tenths of an inch of ice will likely accumulate
around Cape Horn, Rooster Rock SP, Multnomah Falls and Corbett.
Strong east winds will continue this evening before gradually
decreasing overnight

* WHERE...In Washington, Western Columbia River Gorge. In
Oregon, Western Columbia River Gorge.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THURSDAY
